code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] --> Login: User Credentials
    Login --> TokensGenerated: Success
    
    state TokensGenerated {Infra_RedisCache] --> AccessToken_Stateless
        [Infra_EtcdCluster] --> RefreshToken_Stateful
    }
    
    AccessToken_Stateless --> Active: valid for 15m
    Active --> Expired: after 15m
    Expired --> Refresh: use RefreshToken
    
    RefreshToken_Stateful --> StoredInDB: Active for 7d
    StoredInDB --> Rotated: Refresh RPC called
    Rotated --> DeletedFromDB: Old Token
    Rotated --> StoredInDB: New Token Pair Issued
    
    StoredInDB --> Revoked: DeleteUser called
    Revoked --> [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    
    Expired --> [Infra_RedisCache]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Generic Diagram就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Generic Diagram应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Generic Diagram完成整个流程。
